title: Disciplinary panel recommends Giuliani disbarment over 'utter disregard for facts' in 2020 election
description: A disciplinary board for the DC Bar Association recommended that the former Trump attorney be stripped of his law license over reckless fraud claims after the 2020 election.

title: UPS customers weigh backup plans as threatened strike date approaches
description: With a little more than three weeks until UPS workers’ threatened strike date arrives, businesses that rely on the nation’s largest package carrier have been considering their plan Bs.

title: White House officials worried Trump showed reporters classified material while in office, new book recounts
description: Former President Donald Trump aides worried that he was cavalier in his handling of classified information while talking to reporters while in office.

title: Employment among people with disabilities hits post-pandemic high
description: People with disabilities have been among the greatest beneficiaries of the strong post-pandemic rebound in the labor market.

title: Ukraine questions secret talks between former U.S. officials and Russians
description: Ukraine expressed concern over the willingness of some former U.S. government officials to meet with Moscow’s top diplomat and other Russian figures.

title: The (figurative) cage match between Mark Zuckerberg and Elon Musk is on
description: With the release of Instagram Threads, it seems Mark Zuckerberg and Elon Musk are already going head-to-head as the war between Meta and and Twitter escalates.

title: New HIV cases linked to shuttered New Mexico salon that offered 'vampire facials'
description: New Mexico health officials say a total of five HIV infections have been linked to a salon that performed vampire facials and has since been shut down.

title: El Paso Walmart mass shooter Patrick Crusius sentenced to 90 life sentences
description: EL PASO, Texas — The Texas man who fatally shot 23 people at an El Paso Walmart in a targeted attack against people of Mexican descent was sentenced Friday to 90 consecutive life sentences.

title: U.S. to provide cluster munitions to Ukraine
description: The Biden administration is expected to announce Friday that the U.S. will provide cluster munitions to Ukraine, a controversial move to boost the country’s military in its fight against entrenched Russian forces.

title: Serial killer docuseries 'Last Call' reckons with NYC's history of anti-gay violence
description: HBO's new serial killer docuseries "Last Call" re-examines New York City’s yearslong search for a murderer who targeted gay men in the early 1990s.

title: Meta’s Threads becomes most rapidly downloaded app in history
description: Within the first few hours of its launch, more than 30 million users signed up for Meta’s new social media app Threads, which many say is Meta’s answer to ongoing controversy surrounding Twitter. NBC News’ Kalhan Rosenblatt explains what social media users are saying about Threads and whether it could rival Twitter’s hundreds of millions of users.

title: U.S. payrolls climbed by 209,000 in June, less than expected
description: Employment growth eased in June, taking some steam out of what had been a stunningly strong labor market.

title: Twitter CEO Elon Musk threatens to sue new rival Threads
description: In what’s being described as the battle of the billionaires, Twitter CEO Elon Musk is threatening legal action against the new popular platform from Mark Zuckerberg called Threads which garnered 30 million users in 24 hours. “Competition is fine, cheating is not,” Musk said in a tweet about the new rival. NBC’s Miguel Almaguer reports for TODAY.

title: New York beach officials use drones to search for sharks amid a spate of attacks on swimmers
description: Off the coast of Long Island, drones sweep over the ocean, patrolling the water for any danger that might lurk below the surface as beachgoers grow more vigilant because of a recent spate of shark encounters.

title: Yellen defends U.S. actions to protect national security in meeting with Chinese premier
description: U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen defended American actions to protect its national security in prepared remarks for a meeting with Chinese Premier Li Qiang.

title: Ron DeSantis bragged about sending help to Iowa — 10 hours after being told it wasn't needed
description: Ron DeSantis' June 5 tweet touting Florida's role helping Iowa after a building collapse in Davenport came after Iowa said help was no longer needed.

title: Russian jets again harass U.S. drones over Syria, says U.S. military
description: For the second time in less than a day, Russian fighter jets harassed U.S. hunter-killer drones operating over Syria, according to the U.S. military.

title: Houston man whose mother said he was missing no longer wants contact with her, aunt says
description: An aunt of the 25-year-old man thought to have been missing for eight years only to reappear over the weekend says he no longer wants to see nor live with his mother.
